div.div: Sul Ross State vs. Louisiana College

tr.td: SRSU won the toss, deferred the 2nd half

Kyle Galyon rush for loss of 8 yards to the LC13FB31 (Casey Sonier).
Ryan Montague rush for 3 yards to the LC13FB34 (Earl Hines).
Easton Melancon pass incomplete to Jake Dunbar.
